enGB: Armor Attunement
Increases your enhancement bonus to AC by 1. While wielding a shield your enhancement bonus to AC is reduced by 1 (min 1).
Shield Attunement
Increases your enhancement bonus to shield AC by 1.
Weapon Attunement
Increases your main hand weapon's enhancement bonus by 1. While wielding a weapon in your off-hand the bonus is reduced by 1 (min 1).
Weapon Attunement (Off-Hand)
Increases your off hand weapon's enhancement bonus by 1.
Deflection
Increases your deflection bonus to AC by 1.
Toughening
Increases your enhancement bonus to natural armor by 1.
Resistance
Increases your resistance bonus on saving throws by 1.
Mental Prowess
Select Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma. You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to the selected attribute, to a maximum of +4. At level 15 the maximum increases to +6.
Advanced Intellect
You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.
Seasoned Wisdom
You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
Magnetic Charisma
You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to Charisma.
Physical Prowess
Select Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution. You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to the selected attribute, to a maximum of +4. At level 15 the maximum increases to +6.
Formidable Strength
You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to Strength.
Artful Dexterity
You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
Sturdy Constitution
You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
